DOC.brief_summary: After endovascular abdominal aortic aneurysm repair , life-long follow-up need monitor effectiveness exclusion aneurysm sac blood flow . For reason , aneurysm diameter presence endoleaks evaluate CT angiography yearly Endovascular Aneurysm Repair ( EVAR ) . The aim study investigate value MRA examination follow-up patient . The advantage MRA respect CTA use ionize radiation , use less nephrotoxic contrast agent .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Endovascular Aneurysm Treatment - The FEAT Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The FEAT trial ( Follow-up Endovascular Aneurysm Treatment ) design prospective , single-center , follow-up study . 100 Patients enrol study . These patient undergo additional MRA-examinations day EVAR , day EVAR , 6 month 1 year EVAR . These patient also participate conventional CTA follow-up scheme comprise pre- post-operative CTA CTA yearly thereafter . Coagulation parameter blood measure 1 year EVAR .
DOC.criteria: Patient plan endovascular abdominal aortic aneurysm repair contraindication MRI examination claustrophobia pacemaker nonMRI compatible implant
